Our Story

Building Excellence, One Workspace at a Time

The Office Company was born from a simple observation: businesses deserve workspaces that truly work for them. Since our founding in 2008, we've been on a mission to transform how companies approach their office environments.

What started as a small consulting firm has grown into Croatia's most comprehensive office solutions provider. Today, we offer everything from strategic workspace planning and premium furniture to complete office management services.

Our success is built on a foundation of deep industry expertise, unwavering commitment to quality, and genuine partnerships with our clients. Every project we undertake is an opportunity to create something exceptional.

Our Values

What Drives Us

Our core values guide every decision we make and every relationship we build.

Excellence

We set the highest standards in everything we do, from product selection to project execution.

Innovation

We stay ahead of industry trends to bring you cutting-edge solutions and designs.

Integrity

We build lasting relationships through honest communication and transparent practices.

Sustainability

We're committed to environmentally responsible practices and sustainable materials.

Our Journey

Milestones That Matter

2008

Foundation

The Office Company was founded with a mission to transform Croatian workspaces.

2012

Expansion

Expanded services to include full office management and consulting.

2016

Premium Partnerships

Established partnerships with world-leading furniture brands like Haworth and BoConcept.

2020

Digital Transformation

Launched comprehensive digital platform for seamless client experience.

2024

Industry Leader

Recognized as Croatia's premier office solutions provider with 500+ successful projects.

Our diverse team of experts brings together decades of experience and a shared passion for creating exceptional workspaces.
